story:
Selamat malam, little one! Tonight, I have a special story just for you. Gather close and listen carefully, because I have a magical tale to tell.

In the land of Pulau Dewa, where the sun dips into the ocean and paints the sky with hues of orange and pink, there lived a little boy named Eko. Eko was a curious and adventurous boy, with eyes as bright as the stars and a heart full of wonder.

Every night, Eko would climb up a tall bamboo tower in his village, and gaze up at the starry sky. He loved to dream big, imagining himself flying through the clouds, exploring the secrets of the universe, and meeting the mythical creatures that dwelled in the misty mountains.

One night, as Eko was gazing up at the stars, he spotted a shooting star streaking across the sky. With a wish in his heart, he whispered, "I wish to be a guardian of the forest, just like my hero, Sang Pemuja."

As he wished, a gentle breeze rustled the leaves of the nearby trees, and a small, shimmering light appeared before him. It was a spark of magic, imbued with the essence of the forest.

The spark grew brighter, taking the shape of a wise old man with a long white beard and kind eyes. He introduced himself as Bapak Sakti, the guardian of Pulau Dewa. Bapak Sakti revealed that Eko's wish had been heard, and he was chosen to be the next guardian of the forest.

Together, Eko and Bapak Sakti embarked on a journey to explore the mystical realm. They encountered all sorts of creatures, from playful sprites to majestic tigers, and even encountered the mischievous Kijang, a mischievous monkey with a penchant for stealing coconuts from the villagers.

As they roamed the forest, Eko learned the importance of respecting and protecting the natural world. He discovered that every creature, no matter how small or large, played a vital role in the delicate balance of the ecosystem.

As the night wore on, Eko's heart grew fuller with the wisdom and wonder of their journey. And when they returned to the village, he knew that he had become a true guardian of the forest, imbued with the magic of the spark.

Now, my dear child, as you drift off to sleep, remember that you, too, have the power to make a difference. Your heart beats with the same magic as Eko's, and your dreams are full of endless possibilities. May you always cherish and protect the wonders of the natural world, and may your heart be filled with the spark of wonder and curiosity.

Selamat tidur, little one. May your slumber be peaceful and your dreams be sweet.
